actions.name: Temporal Rift

cost.trigger: The user's damaging Psychic-Type attack hits a creature.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user's damaging Psychic-Type attack hits a creature.

Effect: The user freely uses the triggering attack on the start of their next Activation.

system.description:
